languages.text: "Явиться на место встречи с остатками Опустошительной бури. Меня снедает любопытство, что это — ловушка? Или же мои бывшие подданные настолько отчаялись, что действительно решили играть в открытую? Хм... посмотрим".

"To present myself at the meeting place with what remains of the Reaving Tempest. I am overcome with curiosity — is it a trap? Or are my former vassals so desperate that they are really playing in the open? Hmm... We will see."
languages.original_text: "Явиться на место встречи с остатками Опустошительной бури. Меня снедает любопытство, что это — ловушка? Или же мои бывшие подданные настолько отчаялись, что действительно решили играть в открытую? Хм... посмотрим".

"To present myself at the meeting place with what remains of the Reaving Tempest. I am overcome with curiosity — is it a trap? Or are my former vassals so desperate that they really are playing in the open? Hmm... We will see."

languages.text: «Presentarme en el lugar acordado para la reunión con lo que queda de la Tempestad Asoladora. Me pica la curiosidad: ¿es una trampa? ¿O acaso mis antiguos vasallos están tan desesperados como para actuar abiertamente? Mmm... ya veremos».
languages.original_text: "To present myself at the meeting place with what remains of the Reaving Tempest. I am overcome with curiosity — is it a trap? Or are my former vassals so desperate that they are really playing in the open? Hmm... We will see."

traits.locale_text: «Presentarme en el lugar acordado para la reunión con lo que queda de la Tempestad Asoladora. Me pica la curiosidad: ¿es una trampa? ¿O acaso mis antiguos vasallos están tan desesperados como para actuar abiertamente? Mmm... ya veremos».

languages.text: “我打算亲自前往那个地方，与狂风阴谋团的残党见个面。我实在是太好奇了，这是个陷阱吗？还是说，我曾经的手下已经走投无路，打算公然动手了？嗯……我们走着瞧吧。”
languages.original_text: "To present myself at the meeting place with what remains of the Reaving Tempest. I am overcome with curiosity — is it a trap? Or are my former vassals so desperate that they are really playing in the open? Hmm... We will see."

traits.locale_text: “我打算亲自前往那个地方，与狂风阴谋团的残党见个面。我实在是太好奇了，这是个陷阱吗？还是说，我曾经的手下已经走投无路，打算公然动手了？嗯……我们走着瞧吧。”

languages.text: 「略奪の嵐の残骸を持って、会議で自分をアピールするためだ。好奇心のほうが勝ってしまうが…罠なのか？それとも俺の元家臣たちは、本当に公然と戯れるほど追い詰められているのか？ふむ…そのうち分かるだろう」
languages.original_text: "To present myself at the meeting place with what remains of the Reaving Tempest. I am overcome with curiosity — is it a trap? Or are my former vassals so desperate that they are really playing in the open? Hmm... We will see."

traits.locale_text: 「略奪の嵐の残骸を持って、会議で自分をアピールするためだ。好奇心のほうが勝ってしまうが…罠なのか？それとも俺の元家臣たちは、本当に公然と戯れるほど追い詰められているのか？ふむ…そのうち分かるだろう」

languages.text: « Je vais me présenter au lieu de rendez-vous convenu avec les derniers survivants de la Tempête ravageuse. Je suis curieux de voir ce qui m'attend. S'agit-il d'un piège... ou mes anciens vassaux sont-ils désespérés au point de jouer cartes sur table ? Ma foi, nous verrons bien. »
languages.original_text: "To present myself at the meeting place with what remains of the Reaving Tempest. I am overcome with curiosity — is it a trap? Or are my former vassals so desperate that they are really playing in the open? Hmm... We will see."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais me présenter au lieu de rendez-vous convenu avec les derniers survivants de la Tempête ravageuse. Je suis curieux de voir ce qui m'attend. S'agit-il d'un piège... ou mes anciens vassaux sont-ils désespérés au point de jouer cartes sur table ? Ma foi, nous verrons bien. »

languages.text: "Ich soll zum Treffpunkt mit den Überresten des plündernden Sturms gehen. Ich platze fast vor Neugier — ist das eine Falle? Oder sind meine ehemaligen Vasallen derart verzweifelt, dass sie wirklich zum Spielen rauskommen? Hmm ... Wir werden es sehen."
languages.original_text: "To present myself at the meeting place with what remains of the Reaving Tempest. I am overcome with curiosity — is it a trap? Or are my former vassals so desperate that they are really playing in the open? Hmm... We will see."

traits.locale_text: "Ich soll zum Treffpunkt mit den Überresten des plündernden Sturms gehen. Ich platze fast vor Neugier — ist das eine Falle? Oder sind meine ehemaligen Vasallen derart verzweifelt, dass sie wirklich zum Spielen rauskommen? Hmm ... Wir werden es sehen."

languages.original_text: "To present myself at the meeting place with what remains of the Reaving Tempest. I am overcome with curiosity — is it a trap? Or are my former vassals so desperate that they really are playing in the open? Hmm... We will see."

languages.text: "Müfteris Kasırga'dan kalanları da alıp buluşma yerine gitmeyi. Tuzak mı yoksa?.. Çok merak ediyorum. Belki de eski vasallarımın böyle göstere göstere iş yapmaktan başka çaresi kalmamıştır. Hımm... Göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: "To present myself at the meeting place with what remains of the Reaving Tempest. I am overcome with curiosity — is it a trap? Or are my former vassals so desperate that they are really playing in the open? Hmm... We will see."
